name: Orzeł
description:
As a wise man once said “Orzeł ty się upieczesz w tym swetrze”, Orzeł never listened to said advice, and now he has to fight against overheating, since he’s in his sweater, he can last only 10 seconds out there, but don’t worry, Orzeł has few tools in his arsenal to keep him cool

I didn’t had that much time this weekend to work on this, so the game is pretty basic
